cells.data:
-- ratio :: Int -> Int -> Ratio Int
on ratio(x, y)
    script go
        on |λ|(x, y)
            if 0 ≠ y then
                if 0 ≠ x then
                    set d to gcd(x, y)
                    {type:"Ratio", n:(x div d), d:(y div d)}
                else
                    {type:"Ratio", n:0, d:0}
                end if
            else
                missing value
            end if
        end |λ|
    end script
    go's |λ|(x * (signum(y)), abs(y))
end ratio
